ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Theory people should definitely take the course!

I will definitely recommend the course to my fellow students since it is one of the most valuable course in the department. Micro+Macro with finance in a nutshell with alternative approaches. Could be useful for anyone!
Absolutely, this course is indispensable for anyone who wants to conduct research in finance.
A course for everyone who is interested in theory or in finance.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: My knowledgeof finance, general equilibrium, and macroeconomics have expanded and interrelated through this course. One of the most useful courses I have ever taken!
It provides me with a new point of view, equipped with various math tools.
